html:
Don't miss out on the #localgov love! Our partners at @ELGL50 are hosting the 7th annual #CityHallSelfie Day on Mon, Aug 15. Learn more: https://t.co/mOzhk11t4Y pic.twitter.com/VXqUFp3ev0

— Spring Point Partners LLC (@thespringpoint) August 11, 2022

Oh let's have some fun Tigard! Want to celebrate the great work of #localgov? Join us for @ELGL50’s #CityHallSelfie Day on Aug 15! All you have to do is take a photo in front of your fav govt building & use the hashtag #CityHallSelfie. And while you’re at it, tag us too! pic.twitter.com/SzFRkS6AnM

— City of Tigard (@TigardOR) August 11, 2022

In the words of our favorite public servant @parksandrec Chris Traeger, we love this idea and we love us for thinking of it!
For our 50th anniversary, we're planning to visit all 119 cities in the MARC region on #CityHallSelfie Day.
Follow along Aug. 15.#50Forward @ELGL50 pic.twitter.com/nXHYM9xWpo

— MARCKCMetro (@MARCKCMetro) August 11, 2022

It’s less than a week away! Are you ready for #CityHallSelfie Day? Today I stopped for a quick selfie in Monroe, Oregon, population 680. @ELGL50 pic.twitter.com/sQyHDrteLB

— Samantha Harkins (@sjharkins) August 11, 2022

As a nationally recognized #CityHallSelfie Day award winner, I fully intend to bring another prize home to @BlueSpringsGov#CityHallSelfie2020#GoesOnTheResume pic.twitter.com/Rc3tFobUvt

— Mike Ekey (@Mike_Ekey) August 11, 2022

City Hall Selfie Day, Monday, August 15, 2022, is an opportunity for residents to take a selfie in front of a municipal building or with staff, and then post it with the hashtags #CityStAugSelfie, #CityStAug, and #CityHallSelfie, and tag @FlCities, @ELGLNetwork, and @CityStAug pic.twitter.com/UbtAU872nl

— City of St. Augustine (@CityStAug) August 11, 2022

Go for it! #cityhallselfie @BlueSpringsGov #celebratinglocalgov #celebratingGCcommunities https://t.co/BwV7fREucP pic.twitter.com/Fawy7OAVWw

— General Code® (@generalcode) August 11, 2022

On Aug. 15, show your city pride and participate in #cityhallselfieday. Visit https://t.co/vkmo8o1GjR for more info. pic.twitter.com/yHR5wXbTTt

— City of McPherson Local Government (@McPhersonKSInfo) August 11, 2022

Join us in celebrating our local government!

Come down to City Hall next Monday and snap a selfie — you never know who may pop up! #cityhallselfie @CityofMGM pic.twitter.com/Cp8BcP4Ck2

— sydneiofficial (@sydneiofficial) August 11, 2022

Did someone say #cityhallselfie ?? pic.twitter.com/KHu1bUKkLm

— sydneiofficial (@sydneiofficial) August 11, 2022

As a nationally recognized #CityHallSelfie Day award winner, I fully intend to bring another prize home to @BlueSpringsGov#CityHallSelfie2020#GoesOnTheResume pic.twitter.com/Rc3tFobUvt

— Mike Ekey (@Mike_Ekey) August 11, 2022

Did someone say #cityhallselfie ?? pic.twitter.com/KHu1bUKkLm

— sydneiofficial (@sydneiofficial) August 11, 2022

City of Champions! International City Hall Selfie Day is next week! Come take a selfie with @TheKCCurrent Teal Mobile & @Sluggerrr at City Hall on 8/15, 1-1:30pm - Use hashtag #CityHallSelfie #CityHallSelfieKC & tag us + @ELGL50! 🤳📷

Read More: https://t.co/TTdhhhaTLl ⚽️⚾️ pic.twitter.com/6XpMksizPW

— Kansas City, MO (@KansasCity) August 11, 2022

⏪🤳🏽#ThrowbackThursday to last year's @ELGL50 #CityHallSelfieDay when 3 AZ cities were finalists for Members' Choice 🏆 @scottsdaleazgov @CottonwoodAZ @AZSurprise! Are you ready for this year? Show off your city/town on Aug. 15! Details 👉🏽https://t.co/E0whcXwp2J https://t.co/MV4I0sq2vZ

— Arizona League (@AzCities) August 11, 2022

It's back! The seventh annual #CityHallSelfie Day is on Monday, August 15, 2022! We hope you'll join us participation is easy:
1. Snap a Selfie in front of a City facility
2. Post with the hashtags #CityHallSelfie and #CityofOntario
3. Tag us @ontarioeda pic.twitter.com/EneRcctJ6D

— Ontario Economic Development Department (@ontarioeda) August 11, 2022

City of Champions! International City Hall Selfie Day is next week! Come take a selfie with @TheKCCurrent Teal Mobile & @Sluggerrr at City Hall on 8/15, 1-1:30pm - Use hashtag #CityHallSelfie #CityHallSelfieKC & tag us + @ELGL50! 🤳📷

Read More: https://t.co/TTdhhhaTLl ⚽️⚾️ pic.twitter.com/6XpMksizPW

— Kansas City, MO (@KansasCity) August 11, 2022

City of Champions! International City Hall Selfie Day is next week! Come take a selfie with @TheKCCurrent Teal Mobile & @Sluggerrr at City Hall on 8/15, 1-1:30pm - Use hashtag #CityHallSelfie #CityHallSelfieKC & tag us + @ELGL50! 🤳📷

Read More: https://t.co/TTdhhhaTLl ⚽️⚾️ pic.twitter.com/6XpMksizPW

City of Champions! International City Hall Selfie Day is next week! Come take a selfie with @TheKCCurrent Teal Mobile & @Sluggerrr at City Hall on 8/15, 1-1:30pm - Use hashtag #CityHallSelfie #CityHallSelfieKC & tag us + @ELGL50! 🤳📷

City Hall Selfie Day is next Monday!! Want to celebrate the great work of #localgov? Join us for @ELGL50
’s #CityHallSelfie Day on Aug 15! All you have to do is take a photo in front of your fav govt building & use the hashtag #CityHallSelfie. https://t.co/tdOHt5OZuH.

— IowaLeagueofCities (@IowaLeague) August 10, 2022

Heeey, reporter friends! Game is on for #CityHallSelfie Day! Practice your technique & get ready for next Monday, Aug. 15! 😎
cc: @nick_ponton @DavidHorakTV @EmirroraWWMT @LaurenKummerTV @ShopperNews @NickJBuckley @alyssakeown @G_SteeleBC @LaurenEdwardsTVhttps://t.co/UnuV22mNnO

— City of Battle Creek gets vaccinated 💉 (@BattleCreekCity) August 11, 2022

Reason #4 why I love #CityHallSelfie day: It celebrates the diversity of #localgov employees showing who we are, what we value, and how proud we are to serve our communities from every corner of the country! pic.twitter.com/qPdyWfnsGh

— Josh Edwards (@Josh_Edwards11) August 11, 2022

Zencity is joining a really fun #initiative by @ELGL50 #CityHallSelfie Day 2022 🤳
We have employees and clients all over the U.S., so we're taking to the streets to gather selfies in front of #CityHalls all over the country.
Join us in showing off your #localgov love 🏛❤️️ pic.twitter.com/O7poT7tx0j

— Zencity (@Zencityio) August 11, 2022

The McMinnville WORKS interns had their final workshop today, all about resumes and career paths! Thank you to Holly Tate from @uoregon for hosting and guiding our intern cohort this morning. #McMinnvilleWORKS #interns2022 #CityHallSelfie #ProfessionalDevelopment #Resume #Career pic.twitter.com/bhJgd31sFU

— McMinnville WORKS (@McMinnvilleWORK) August 10, 2022

#CityHallSelfieDay is 8/15! 🤳
Join us in celebrating the #localgov service. Participation is easy:
🤳 Take a picture of yourself (or with friends & family) in front of a City facility
📱 Post the picture with the hashtags #CityofOntario and #CityHallSelfie
😁 Tag us in your post pic.twitter.com/u34ZT7svfW

— City of Ontario (@CityofOntario) August 11, 2022

😁 Tag us in your post pic.twitter.com/u34ZT7svfW

— City of Ontario (@CityofOntario) August 11, 2022

Join us in taking part in City Hall Selfie Day Monday, August 15!🤳

1️⃣ Snap a picture in front of City Hall or any City building, park, or facility.

2️⃣ Post it on social media, include #CityHallSelfie, and tag us!

We look forward to seeing your selfies!#WeAreIrvine pic.twitter.com/QZeiUqRhkT

— City of Irvine (@City_of_Irvine) August 11, 2022

— City of Scottsdale (@scottsdaleazgov) August 9, 2022

#CityHallSelfie is BACK on Monday, August 15th! Join the Mayor's Office from Noon to 4 p.m. in Houdini Plaza. Grab a selfie with Appleton's famous Gorilla and spread some positivity with a heart flower balloon. #LocalGovernmentLove #Appleton @ELGL50 @LeagueWIMunis pic.twitter.com/gDdq4S5d3R

— City of Appleton (@cityofappleton) August 9, 2022

Officer Edwards is ready for #CityHallSelfie Day 2022! 🤳On Monday, August 15 help us celebrate public service and stop by a city building to take a selfie. We can’t wait to see all of the City Hall selfies! 📸 pic.twitter.com/PKkewV2GEO

— University Park, TX (@CityofUPTX) August 9, 2022

#CityHallSelfie is BACK on Monday, August 15th! Join the Mayor's Office from Noon to 4 p.m. in Houdini Plaza. Grab a selfie with Appleton's famous Gorilla and spread some positivity with a heart flower balloon. #LocalGovernmentLove #Appleton @ELGL50 @LeagueWIMunis pic.twitter.com/gDdq4S5d3R

We’re just 1 week away from @ELGL50’s #CityHallSelfie Day!!!

Why do I love the day? #6 Bringing family and friends into my passion for #localgov! #CityHallSelfie helped me teach my kids one of their early words "City Hall" and press upon them how important it is that know matter where they live someday they need to show up and be involved. pic.twitter.com/9kGPyB4hKr

— Josh Edwards (@Josh_Edwards11) August 9, 2022

.@ELGL50’s 7th annual #CityHallSelfie Day is almost here!!!
